body: I don't see how that helps. The issue is that the test for a block overlap requires that arithmetic be performed on an offset, specifically the test in [rectanglesOverlap](https://github.com/gonum/matrix/blob/master/mat64/shadow.go#L187). You are right that it simplifies these [two conditions](https://github.com/gonum/matrix/blob/master/mat64/shadow.go#L45), but that is a minor component of the test.
